document.heading: Flat Fuel Tax Amendment Act of 1985

history.narrative: Law 6-80, the “Flat Fuel Tax Amendment Act of 1985,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-112, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 22, 1985 and November 5, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 26, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-105 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
